system.effect:
Trigger - Your Pokémon uses the Groundshaper Capability, or a Move with the Groundsource keyword
Effect: Your Pokémon may make a Trip Attempt as a Free Action against any Pokémon targeted by the Move, or standing on a square changed by the Groundshaper capability. Your Pokémon gains a bonus to their Combat Roll equal to half of your Type-Linked Skill Rank.
system.prerequisites: Mold the Earth, Type-Linked Skill at Master
system.name: Upheaval
